item.title: About
item.description: About Me Hi, I am Maluki Muthusi. I am software engineer passionate about technology and its use cases in solving problems. Some of the programming languages I use are Go, Dart, Java, Kotlin and JavaScript. I do write cross platform applications using flutter toolkit. Reach Me You can reach me through social media LinkedIn, Twitter or Github. Or through my email malukimuthusi@gmail.com
